casebody.data:
SIRY INVESTMENT, L.P., petitioner,
v.
Morad NEMAN, Individually and as Trustee of the Neman Family Revocable Trust and the Yedidia Investment Defined Benefit Plan, et al. No. 12-1446. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013. Case below, 2012 WL 6182858 .

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Second Appellate District, denied.
